caldavtest.description: Test COPY/MOVE behavior with implicit scheduling (also some PUT restrictions)

test.description: Organizer tries PUT of same resource to another calendar
Organizer tries PUT of same resource to a collection
Organizer tries PUT of same resource without Organizer/Attendee to another calendar
Organizer tries PUT of same resource without Organizer/Attendee to a collection
Organizer stores without Attendeeinto another calendar
Attendee tries PUT of same resource to another calendar
Attendee tries PUT of same resource to a collection
Attendee tries PUT of same resource without Organizer/Attendee to another calendar
Attendee tries PUT of same resource without Organizer/Attendee to a collection

test-suite.name: MOVE to calendar with overwrite - ORGANIZER

test.description: Organizer stores to calendar - no Attendee
Organizer stores to collection without Attendee

test-suite.name: COPY between calendars/collections no scheduling - ORGANIZER
COPY between calendars/collections with scheduling - ORGANIZER/ATTENDEE
COPY to calendar with overwrite - ORGANIZER

test.description: Organizer stores to calendar - no Attendee
Organizer stores to collection without Attendee
